body.para: Restore records marked for deletion in the current work area.
RECALL is the inverse of the DELETE command. If SetDeleted() is TRUE, RECALL can restore the current record or a specific record if you specify a RECORD scope.

para.text: Once you PACK a database file, all marked records are physically removed from the file and cannot be recalled.

body.para: Shared mode: For a shared database, this command requires all records that it operates on to be locked. You can accomplish this using one or more record locks or a file lock, depending on the scope of the command.
